items.sentence: Tom is definitely not in a joking mood today.
I suspected Tom was hiding something from me.
I think Tom is going to do something drastic.
I think Tom should be home with his children.
Did you find the things you were looking for?
Did you get anything to eat on your way home?
Did you get the flowers I sent the other day?
Did you have something you wanted to tell us?
Did you know Mozart wrote a bassoon concerto?
Did you know Tom used to be a French teacher?
Do you think it\'s difficult to speak French?
Do you think it\'s safe to go into this cave?
Do you think that I\'m not trying my hardest?
My mother bought two bottles of orange juice.
Tom is scheduled to come to Boston next week.
I began to play clarinet when I was thirteen.
I bought this guitar for just thirty dollars.
I can assure you there is no need to do that.
I can hear Tom playing guitar in his bedroom.
I can only speak French and a little English.
